rows.label: tlk70000060_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Uhh... So I kinda got lost
the other day. Kaede-chan
had a real go at me.

rows.label: tlk70000060_03_msg0002
rows.name:
A passing Driver saw us, and
there was this look on their
face like you wouldn't believe.

rows.label: tlk70000060_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Apparently in Invidia, a Blade would
never turn on their Driver like that.
They don't treat them as friends.

rows.label: tlk70000060_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I guess there's all sorts in the world,
huh... But Kaede-chan really is my friend,
and nothing can ever change that!
